title: Despicable Me Bundle - 5 Items Minions 4-Puzzle Pack, 2 Coloring and Activity Books, Minions Grab & Go Play Pack, Pack of 24 Crayola Crayons
features: 5 item Despicable Me Minions gift pack. Perfect for holidays, birthdays, or any occasion. Includes the following:
One (1) 4-puzzle pack. Puzzles are small and easy to assemble, perfect for beginners. Each one has 12 pieces and is 5 by 4.5 inches when assembled. See photos for completed puzzles.
Two (2) Coloring and Activity Books. Each provides many hours of fun with games, puzzles, mazes and coloring activities. Books measure approximately 8" x 10.75" and have about 96 pages each.

One (1) Grab & Go Play Pack in resealable bag. Includes a small 24-page coloring book, 4 small crayons, and a sheet of 25 stickers. Good for playtime travel. Fits in a purse or car's glovebox. 4.5 x 7.5 inches.

One (1) box of 24 Crayola Crayons. Superb quality brand with robust color assortment, including primary and secondary colors. Bright, vibrant, and durable colors. Easily portable box for home or school use.
